DLG ITM_3

DLG a
I'm a cat

DLG SPR_0
"""
Cherry Twins : o hello there Action Pomegranate... solving any crimes?

Action Pomegranate : i don't solve crimes, i Action Them B)
Cherry Twins : ... pom ... that doesn't make any sense.
"""

DLG ITM_0
Action Pomegranate : ... I think I locked myself up here

DLG ITM_1
Action Pomegranate : Pomegranate in french is "grenade"... Powerful but ... fragle. Handle with care.

DLG ITM_2
"""
Action Pomegranate : the city never sleeps. it never awakes either i guess. it kind of is? like ... a ... stone? 


Aced it. and they gave me a failing grade in that community college poetry course 
"""

DLG ITM_3
Action Pomegranate : i wish i could see at night easier with these shades
